verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH413> about הַמִּצְוָ֥ה <WH4687> this commandment הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> O הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> And now O ye priests

אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְע֡וּ <WH8085> If ye will not hear וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹא֩ <WH3808> not תָשִׂ֨ימוּ <WH7760> and if ye will not lay עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֜ב <WH3820> [it] to heart לָתֵ֧ת <WH5414> to give כָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> glory לִשְׁמִ֗י <WH8034> unto my name אָמַר֙ <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> I will even send בָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּאֵרָ֔ה <WH3994> a curse וְאָרוֹתִ֖י <WH779> upon you and I will curse אֶת־ <WH853> בִּרְכֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1293> your blessings וְגַם֙ <WH1571> and indeed אָרוֹתִ֔יהָ <WH779> yea I have cursed כִּ֥י <WH3588> them because אֵינְכֶ֖ם <WH369> are not שָׂמִ֥ים <WH7760> them already because ye do not lay עַל־ <WH5921> to לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> [it] to heart

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going גֹעֵ֤ר <WH1605> Behold I will corrupt לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַזֶּ֔רַע <WH2233> your seed וְזֵרִ֤יתִי <WH2219> and spread פֶ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH6569> dung עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> upon your faces פֶּ֖רֶשׁ <WH6569> [even] the dung חַגֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH2282> of your solemn feasts וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> and [one] shall take you away אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> then

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> And ye shall know כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> that I have sent אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> this commandment הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise לִֽהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> may continue בְּרִיתִי֙ <WH1285> unto you that my covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> might be with Levi אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

בְּרִיתִ֣י ׀ <WH1285> My covenant הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for הַֽחַיִּים֙ <WH2416> was with him of life וְהַ֨שָּׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> and peace וָאֶתְּנֵֽם־ <WH5414> and I gave ל֥וֹ מוֹרָ֖א <WH4172> them to him [for] the fear וַיִּֽירָאֵ֑נִי <WH3372> wherewith he feared וּמִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name נִחַ֥ת <WH2865> me and was afraid הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

תּוֹרַ֤ת <WH8451> The law אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> of truth הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> was in בְּפִ֔יהוּ <WH6310> was in his mouth וְעַוְלָ֖ה <WH5766> and iniquity לֹא־ <WH3808> was not נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> was not found בִשְׂפָתָ֑יו <WH8193> in his lips בְּשָׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> with me in peace וּבְמִישׁוֹר֙ <WH4334> and equity הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> he walked אִתִּ֔י <WH854> for וְרַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> many הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> away מֵעָוֹֽן׃ <WH5771> from iniquity

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For שִׂפְתֵ֤י <WH8193> lips כֹהֵן֙ <WH3548> For the priest's יִשְׁמְרוּ־ <WH8104> should keep דַ֔עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְתוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> the law יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> and they should seek מִפִּ֑יהוּ <WH6310> at his mouth כִּ֛י <WH3588> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> for he [is] the messenger יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you סַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH5493> But ye are departed מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way הִכְשַׁלְתֶּ֥ם <WH3782> to stumble רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> ye have caused many בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> at the law שִֽׁחַתֶּם֙ <WH7843> ye have corrupted בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> the covenant הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> Therefore have I also made אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> נִבְזִ֥ים <WH959> you contemptible וּשְׁפָלִ֖ים <WH8217> and base לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> before all the people כְּפִ֗י <WH6310> according אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אֵֽינְכֶם֙ <WH369> are not שֹׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> as ye have not kept אֶת־ <WH854> for דְּרָכַ֔י <WH1870> my ways וְנֹשְׂאִ֥ים <WH5375> are showing פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> accept בַּתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> in the law פ

הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not אָ֤ב <WH1> fathers אֶחָד֙ <WH259> Have we not all one לְכֻלָּ֔נוּ <WH3605> all הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not אֵ֥ל <WH410> God אֶֽחָ֖ד <WH259> have one בְּרָאָ֑נוּ <WH1254> created מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why נִבְגַּד֙ <WH898> us? why do we deal treacherously אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man בְּאָחִ֔יו <WH251> against his brother לְחַלֵּ֖ל <WH2490> by profaning בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> the covenant אֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> fathers

בָּגְדָ֣ה <WH898> hath dealt treacherously יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וְתוֹעֵבָ֛ה <WH8441> and an abomination נֶעֶשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> is committed בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel וּבִירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for חִלֵּ֣ל <WH2490> hath profaned יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> for Judah קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holiness יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָהֵ֔ב <WH157> which he loved וּבָעַ֖ל <WH1166> and hath married בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֵ֥ל <WH410> god נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> of a strange

יַכְרֵ֨ת <WH3772> will cut off יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD לָאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂ֙נָּה֙ <WH6213> that doeth עֵ֣ר <WH5782> this the master וְעֹנֶ֔ה <WH6030> and the scholar מֵאָהֳלֵ֖י <WH168> out of the tabernacles יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּמַגִּ֣ישׁ <WH5066> and him that offereth מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> an offering לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

וְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise שֵׁנִ֣ית <WH8145> again תַּֽעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> And this have ye done כַּסּ֤וֹת <WH3680> covering דִּמְעָה֙ <WH1832> with tears אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּכִ֖י <WH1065> with weeping וַֽאֲנָקָ֑ה <WH603> and with crying out מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> no ע֗וֹד <WH5750> longer פְּנוֹת֙ <WH6437> insomuch that he regardeth אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> not the offering וְלָקַ֥חַת <WH3947> any more or receiveth רָצ֖וֹן <WH7522> [it] with good will מִיֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> at your hand

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> Yet ye say עַל־ <WH5921> For מָ֑ה <WH4100> what עַ֡ל <WH5921> and כִּי־ <WH3588> for יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> the LORD הֵעִ֨יד <WH5749> hath been witness בֵּינְךָ֜ <WH996> between וּבֵ֣ין ׀ <WH996> between אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> between thee and the wife נְעוּרֶ֗יךָ <WH5271> of thy youth אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בָּגַ֣דְתָּה <WH898> against whom thou hast dealt treacherously בָּ֔הּ וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> she חֲבֶרְתְּךָ֖ <WH2278> yet [is] she thy companion וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> and the wife בְּרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1285> of thy covenant

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> one עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> And did not he make וּשְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> remnant ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> of the spirit ל֔וֹ וּמָה֙ <WH4100> and what הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> did one מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> was seeking זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> seed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> a godly וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> Therefore take heed בְּר֣וּחֲכֶ֔ם <WH7307> to your spirit וּבְאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> against the wife נְעוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH5271> of his youth אַל־ <WH408> no יִבְגֹּֽד׃ <WH898> and let none deal treacherously

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׂנֵ֣א <WH8130> that he hateth שַׁלַּ֗ח <WH7971> putting away אָמַ֤ר <WH559> saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְכִסָּ֤ה <WH3680> for [one] covereth חָמָס֙ <WH2555> violence עַל־ <WH5921> and לְבוּשׁ֔וֹ <WH3830> with his garment אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH8104> therefore take heed בְּרוּחֲכֶ֖ם <WH7307> to your spirit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִבְגֹּֽדוּ׃ <WH898> that ye deal not treacherously ס

הוֹגַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH3021> Ye have wearied יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1697> with your words וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> Yet ye say בַּמָּ֣ה <WH4100> How הוֹגָ֑עְנוּ <WH3021> Wherein have we wearied בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֗ם <WH559> [him]? When ye say כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone עֹ֨שֵׂה <WH6213> Every one that doeth רָ֜ע <WH7451> evil ט֣וֹב ׀ <WH2896> [is] good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבָהֶם֙ ה֣וּא <WH1931> and He חָפֵ֔ץ <WH2654> and he delighteth א֥וֹ <WH176> or אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> Where אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> in them or Where [is] the God הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> adversary
